name: AWS EC2 Metrics
description: The Sumo Logic App for AWS EC2 Metrics allows you to collect your EC2 instance metrics and display them using predefined search queries and Dashboards. The App provides Dashboards to display analysis of EC2 instance metrics for cpu, disk, memory, network.

children.name: 1. AWS EC2 Metrics - Overview
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Overview dashboard provides at-a-glance information about a EC2 CPU, memory, network and disk usage.
children.title: 1. AWS EC2 Metrics - Overview

panels.title: Average CPU Idle per Instance Type

queries.queryString: metric=CPU_Idle account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by instanceType

panels.title: Overall Average CPU Load (1m, 5m, 15m)
panels.visualSettings: {"general":{"mode":"timeSeries"},"color":{"family":"scheme7"},"axes":{"axisY":{"title":"Average CPU Load"}},"overrides":[{"series":[],"queries":["A"],"userProvidedChartType":false,"properties":{"name":"1 Minute Average CPU Load"}},{"series":[],"queries":["B"],"userProvidedChartType":false,"properties":{"name":"5 Minute Average CPU Load"}},{"series":[],"queries":["C"],"userProvidedChartType":false,"properties":{"name":"15 Minute Average CPU Load"}}]}

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_1min | avg by metric
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_5min | avg by metric
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_15min | avg by metric

panels.title: Total Free System Memory per Instance Type

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_Free | sum by instanceType

panels.title: Total Used, Less Buffers and Cached Memory per Instance Type

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_ActualUsed | sum by instanceType

panels.title: Disk Used Bytes per Instance Type

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Used | sum by instanceType

panels.title: Disk Available Bytes per Instance Type

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Available | sum by instanceType

panels.title: Network InByte Rate per Instance Type

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InBytes | sum by instanceType | rate

panels.title: Network OutByte Rate per Instance Type

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutBytes | sum by instanceType | rate
metric=CPU_Sys account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} entity={{entity}} | avg
metric= Mem_UsedPercent account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg
metric= TCP_InboundTotal account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg
metric= TCP_OutboundTotal account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg
metric= Net_InBytes account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg | eval _value/1024/1024
metric= Net_OutBytes account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg | eval _value/1024/1024
metric=CPU_Sys account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} entity={{entity}} | eval(_value/_value) | quantize to 60m using count | count by instancetype
metric=CPU_Sys account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} entity={{entity}} | filter latest > 75
metric= Mem_UsedPercent account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | filter latest > 75

children.name: 1. AWS EC2 Metrics - Summary
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Summary dashboard provides at-a-glance information about a EC2 CPU, memory, network and disk usage.
children.title: 1. AWS EC2 Metrics - Summary

queries.queryString: metric=CPU_Idle account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}}

account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_15min | avg by metric
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_Free

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_ActualUsed

account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Available

account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InBytes | sum by entity | rate

children.name: 2. AWS EC2 Metrics - CPU
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - CPU dashboard provides details information about a EC2 CPU usage.
children.title: 2. AWS EC2 Metrics - CPU

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_User | avg by entity
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_Nice
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_Sys | avg by entity
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_Irq
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric= CPU_SoftIrq
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_Idle
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric= CPU_Stolen
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_IOWait

children.name: 3. AWS EC2 Metrics - Memory
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Memory dashboard provides details information about a EC2 memory usage.
children.title: 3. AWS EC2 Metrics - Memory

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_Total
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_UsedPercent
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric= Mem_FreePercent

panels.title: Total Free, Buffers and Cached Memory

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_ActualFree

panels.title: Total Used, Less Buffers and Cached Memory

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_ActualUsed
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_Free
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_Used

children.name: 4. AWS EC2 Metrics - Disk

children.title: 4. AWS EC2 Metrics - Disk

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Used
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Available
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Reads | sum by entity | rate
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_ReadBytes | sum by entity | rate
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Writes | sum by entity | rate
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_WriteBytes | sum by entity | rate
metric=Disk_UsedPercent account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}}
metric=Disk_Queue account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}}

children.name: 5. AWS EC2 Metrics - Network
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Network dashboard provides details information about a EC2 Network activities based on In and out packets, bytes.
children.title: 5. AWS EC2 Metrics - Network

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InPackets | sum by entity | rate
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutPackets | sum by entity | rate
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InBytes | sum by entity | rate
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutBytes | sum by entity | rate

children.name: 6. AWS EC2 Metrics - TCP
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - TCP dashboard provides details information about a EC2 connection details.
children.title: 6. AWS EC2 Metrics - TCP

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_InboundTotal
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_OutboundTotal
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_Listen
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_Established
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_CloseWait
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_TimeWait
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_Idle
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_Close
